channel.title: Lab News on The Niederhuth Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Lab News on The Niederhuth Lab

item.title: Coming Soon to MSU
item.description: I’m happy to say that the Niederhuth Lab will be starting at Michigan State University in the Department of Plant Biology on January 1, 2018. Our research focuses on plant genomics and epigenomics using both experimental and computational approaches. If you are interested in joining the lab, please check our current openings!
